name: Fettuccine With Morels
recipeIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the fettuccine and cook until al dente, about 10 minutes. Drain. Toss with the morel gratin and the parsley. Season with the salt and pepper. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
